banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How to build social capital

nodes.whoTheyAre: Reza’s quest to differentiate himself during professional interactions led him to create OVOU, a smart business card that uses NFC and QR technology to share profiles. His mission is to inspire people to network, make connections, and build meaningful relationships that fuel their success.

videoData.description: As the world of work gets increasingly competitive and volatile, few of us can forge our paths through it alone. Entrepreneur Reza Varzidehkar explains the concept of social capital—the benefits we can derive from our personal networks—and shares actionable advice on how to acquire it.
videoData.socialDescription: As the world of work gets increasingly competitive and volatile, few of us can forge our paths through it alone. Entrepreneur Reza Varzidehkar explains the concept of social capital—the benefits we can derive from our personal networks—and shares actionable advice on how to acquire it.
